item.title: Doom Raiders
item.description: Summary An adventuring party not unlike the Trollskull crew After raiding every dungeon they could, they founded a mercenary compamy named the Black Network Eventually, they allied themselves with Manshoon leading to the Black Network’s transformation in to the Zhentarim Key Members Left to right in the image below:

item.title: Factions
item.description: The Trollskull Team You guys! Doom Raiders An ex-adventuring party turned mercenary group turned gang generals turned unlikely allies to the party

item.title: Force Gray
item.description: Summary Led by Vajra Safahr - the [[Blackstaff]] and head mage in Waterdeep

item.title: The Trollskull Team
item.description: Matrick / [[Matrick Side-Eyes]] Character Sheet Chad / [[Cruceus Hieron Auric Disthenes]] Character Sheet Saf / [[Safvyre Everdreya]] Character Sheet

item.title: Zhentarim
item.description: Summary A mercenary company turned gang that the Doom Raiders helped Manshoon found to fund his extremely expensive magical experiments
